meanings.definition: A person who repairs or adjusts mechanical or electronic devices in an experimental or unskilled manner.
meanings.sent1: The tinkerers in the garage were trying to fix the old radio.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a tinkerer who loves to tinker with broken toys.
meanings.sent3: The tinkerers at the repair shop accidentally turned on the vacuum cleaner while fixing it.
meanings.sent4: The tinkerers' workshop was a buzzing hive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tinkerers tinkering away on the broken clock stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys experimenting with or fixing things in a makeshift or amateur way.
meanings.sent1: The group of tinkerers gathered in the backyard to build a makeshift treehouse.
meanings.sent2: She is known in the neighborhood as the tinkerer who can fix anything with duct tape.
meanings.sent3: The tinkerers decided to try fixing the leaky faucet with bubble gum.
meanings.sent4: The tinkerers' creativity knew no bounds as they repurposed old computer parts into art.
meanings.sent5: The tinkerers' passion for tinkering shone through in their inventive creations.
